description: Our networked world is drowning in data, affecting the way business, government, science, and healthcare are conducted. The NYIT Data Science, M.S. is designed to help professionals and researchers sort through this data tsunami, by providing a fundamental understanding of the methods and algorithms of data science.By the end of our 30-credit program, graduates will have the skills and knowledge to transform data into relevant insights for making better business decisions by:
